name: MP3 Concatenator
description: Concatenates multiple MP3 files into a single MP3 using ffmpeg. It adds them one after another in the defined order.
author: @@official.shinkai

optional_output_path.description: Optional destination path to also save a copy (can be a directory or a file path).

output_filename.description: Optional filename for the output saved in the Shinkai home path ('.mp3' extension will be ensured).

input_files.description: Absolute paths to MP3 files to concatenate, in order.

items.description: Absolute path to an MP3 file

home_saved_path.description: Path of the generated MP3 file saved in the home path.

optional_saved_path.description: Path where the additional copy was saved, if provided.
